long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In the Azure portal, the need to frequently hit the Refresh button can indeed be a bit cumbersome, especially when you're monitoring resources or waiting for changes to take effect. You just worship the cult of Refresh button. There is now a Safari Extension to do that for you: to automatically refresh Azure Portal pages! It is a practical and smart solution to avoid manual refreshes. It will click them every 10 seconds when there are no mouse or keyboard activity on the page. Or until there will be a Refresh button on Azure portal ;)
